member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.IShow
member.summary: Represents the interface for Show method

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.IClose
member.summary: Represents the interface for Close method

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.IDispose
member.summary: Represents the interface for dispose method

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.LayoutType
member.summary: Contains values of LayoutType that determines arrangement of items on rim either automatic or user defined

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.LayoutType.Default
member.summary: Available items can populated on the rim by sharing the available space in equal ratio. Order of the item based on order of items in the assigned source.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.LayoutType.Custom
member.summary: User can split the available spaces using VisibleSegmentCount as segments. Exceeded items will not shown and beneath items leave empty space on rim. User can rearrange or position the items using SegmentIndex property of SfRadialMenuItem.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.SfRadialMenu.NavigatingEventHandler
member.summary: Occurs when a Radial Menu item tapped to starts navigating to its next hierarchy level or Center back button is tapped to starts navigating to previous hierarchy level. Its occurs only an item that has children.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.SfRadialMenu.Navigating
member.summary: Occurs when a Radial Menu item tapped to starts navigating to its next hierarchy level or Center back button is tapped to starts navigating to previous hierarchy level. Its occurs only an item that has children.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.SfRadialMenu.RaiseNavigating(Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.NavigatingEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the Navigating method.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.SfRadialMenu.NavigatedEventHandler
member.summary: Occurs when a Radial Menu item tapped and navigated to its next hierarchy level or Center back button is tapped to navigated to its previous hierarchy level. Its occurs only an item that has children.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.SfRadialMenu.Navigated
member.summary: Occurs when a Radial Menu item tapped and navigated to its next hierarchy level or Center back button is tapped to navigated to its previous hierarchy level. Its occurs only an item that has children.

member.summary: Raises the Navigated method.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonView

member.summary: Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for CenterButtonView property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonText
member.summary: Get or set the value indicating text of the center button at first level and it can also act as font icon. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterButtonView.

member.summary: Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for CenterButtonText property.

member.summary: Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for CenterButtonTextColor property.

member.summary: Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for CenterButtonBackgroundColor property.

member.summary: Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for CenterButtonRadius property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.SfRadialMenu.CenterButtonFontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicating the font family of the text of center button at first level. Font icon support will achieved through this support. It will not applicable to custom view assigned through CenterButtonView.

member.summary: Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for CenterButtonFontFamily property.

member.summary: Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for CenterButtonFontSize property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfRadialMenu.XForms.SfRadialMenu.VisibleSegmentsCount

member.summary: Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for VisibleSegmentsCount property.
